mapper.select: SELECT MEM.USER_NO , USER_NAME , PASSWORD , LOGIN_TYPE , NICK_NAME , PHONE , TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') JOIN_DATE FROM MEMBER_USER MEM, REALTOR_DETAIL REAL WHERE LOGIN_TYPE = 'USER'

SELECT REALTOR_CODE , OFFICE_NAME , IDENTIFICATION_NUM , LICENSE_FILE_NAME , AUTHORITY , LOGIN_TYPE , REAL.USER_NO , TO_CHAR(REQUEST_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') REQUEST_DATE FROM MEMBER_USER MEM, REALTOR_DETAIL REAL WHERE LOGIN_TYPE = 'REALTOR'
mapper.update: UPDATE REALTOR_DETAIL SET AUTHORITY = 'Y' WHERE EXISTS (SELECT AUTHORITY FROM MEMBER_USER WHERE LOGIN_TYPE = 'REALTOR' AND REALTOR_CODE = #{realTorCode} )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NUM , INFO_TITLE , TO_CHAR(INFO_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INFO_REGDATE FROM INFO_BOARD ORDER BY INFO_REGDATE DESC
SELECT BOARD_NUM , INFO_TITLE , INFO_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(INFO_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INFO_REGDATE FROM INFO_BOARD WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
